hasDitaContent.@value: Tigecycline increases the risk of bleeding events when given with acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tigecycline   increases   the risk of bleeding events when given with   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with tigecycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.
